trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_SEQ_00<tab>The naturalist Marcette at Dunstan's Spire is in need of a research assistant.

TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_SEQ_01<tab>Marcette is doing research for the <var 1A 02 /var>New Eorzean Geographic<var 1A 01 /var>, her compendium of knowledge in the making, and requires toadstool caps to complete the chapter on fungi.
TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_SEQ_02<tab>You have successfully obtained the toadstool caps. Deliver them to Marcette.

TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_SEQ_03<tab>Marcette is immensely pleased with herself at her most recent scientific discovery─so pleased that she has entirely forgotten the identity of the adventurer who made it possible...
TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the toadstool caps to Marcette.

TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_MARCETTE_000_000<tab>You have the honor of addressing Marcette, realm-renowned naturalist and esteemed authoress of the <var 1A 02 /var>New Eorzean Geographic<var 1A 01 /var>, the single most comprehensive collection of knowledge our realm has ever seen─or ever <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> see.

TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_MARCETTE_000_001<tab>You've not heard of the <var 1A 02 /var>Geographic<var 1A 01 /var>? Why, of course you haven't─it hasn't been published yet! And it never will be if my assistants keep dawdling around instead of doing their jobs! So hop to it!

TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_MARCETTE_000_002<tab>Of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> I'm talking to you! Do you see anyone else here? Now, for the seventy-thousandth time: five toadstool caps, and be quick with them!
TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_MARCETTE_000_010<tab>Have you brought me my toadstool caps? Each moment you dally deprives the realm of my prodigious knowledge!

TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_MARCETTE_000_020<tab>Yes, yes, hand it over, now. But of course! It is just as I theorized─the spore density of these toadstools is exponentially greater than that of samples taken from before the Calamity!

TEXT_GAIUSA909_00804_MARCETTE_000_021<tab>Clearly, they have evolved as such in order to adapt to an increasingly harsh environment. Muahahaha! And with this, another entry of the <var 1A 02 /var>New Eorzean Geographic<var 1A 01 /var> is complete! ...Ahem, who are you, again?
